Host-->Target-->Target?

I tested on 
IBM 1.4.2 (J9VM - 20040916_0908_lHdSMR) and Sun 1.4.2_07-b05

I am still able to reproduce (inconsistently) on 1.4.2_07

The line numbers in comment #2 don't match our current code. Line 163 should be throwing a 
VMDisconnectedException.

Darins, could you update/export your jdt.debug plugin and run on it? I've made a couple small changes 
that may give us more informative error messages when a time out occurs.

see bug #87144. It seems that firewalls can cause problems for the debugger. Still investigating. Does 
disabling your firewall make a difference?
